Pre-Game Insights: The Bucks could be a little shorthanded for this one with Giannis Antetokounmpo listed as questionable with an illness, while the Pacers are still keeping eyes on Obi Toppin who is questionable for this one.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks have won 12 of their last 13 home games against the Bucks following a road win.
Each of the Pacers' last eight home games against the Bucks has gone OVER the total points line.
Others: The pick in this article is the opinion of the writer, not a PickDawgz site consensus.
